I am still new trying to design a test case whereby my class file can
read =
this xml file and come out with the necessary results / scenario.

Sorry, b=
ut I am still new to JUnit.

Say that if I have this xml file code:

<secti=
on-manage>
   <display section_id=3D"acquisition" order=3D"ASC" sort_column=
=3D"2" />
   <display section_id=3D"serials" order=3D"DESC" sort_column=3D"=
4" />
</section-manage>

The conditions are:

1. If display section is inco=
rrect or null, the entire node is ignored.
2. If the order is incorrect it =
will revert to the default value ASC.
3. If sort_column is lower than 1 or =
more than 10, it will revert the
default value to 1.

I am not sure whether=
 I got it right, but I do know that I have to use

 own test class file, but with some help and
